column5: Went out today to cast the river mouth, just to make sure the new stuff worked. A few steelhead were being caught, I caught a sucker, a walleye and a smallmouth bass (no photos) but no rainbows. I've never seen or caught walleye or smallmouth in that spot before, but it's not too far of a stretch I guess?  Took the long way home to look at the spot we'll be starting at tomorrow. Sure enough there were fish there.       How'd I do with the backgrounds???
I know where that is...........hahahahah (sorry, just wanted to be the first to say that, since a few people seem to know EVERY spot others post.  Looks like you're in for a good morning! Good luck!
good luck tomorrow!  wait a sec, I see water & plant life too...  hummm...  the secret out?
Wow- Is that the Credit River ?
LOL!!  Dang... I can't contain myself no more... ITS OPENER BABY!! YYYEEEEEEEEEEE  Here's to everyone getting their fill.  cheers HD
